formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Given rise r and run a (same units), the fundamental trig relation is: $$\theta = \arctan\!\left(\frac{r}{a}\right)$$ Pitch in-12 (x-in-12): $$x = 12 \cdot \frac{r}{a}$$ Slope percentage: $$\text{slope}\% = 100 \cdot \frac{r}{a}$$ For an actual horizontal run A, the actual rise R and rafter length L are: $$R = A \cdot \frac{r}{a} \quad\text{and}\quad L = \sqrt{A^2 + R^2} = A \cdot \sqrt{1 + \left(\frac{r}{a}\right)^2}$$
